com.enjin.sdk.schemas.shared.arguments

Interface AssetFragmentArguments<T extends VariableHolder<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the implementing class
    All Superinterfaces:
    VariableHolder<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PlayerFragmentArguments<T>, WalletFragmentArguments<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GetAsset, GetAssets, GetPlayer, GetPlayer, GetPlayers, GetWallet, GetWallet, GetWallets

    public interface AssetFragmentArguments<T extends VariableHolder<T>>
extends VariableHolder<T>
    Fragment interface used to request certain information from assets returned by the platform.
    See Also:
    Asset

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T assetIdFormat(AssetIdFormat assetIdFormat)
      Sets the desired asset ID format.
      default T withAssetBlocks()
      Sets the request to include the block data with the asset when used with withStateData().
      default T withAssetVariantMode()
      Sets the request to include the variant mode with the asset.
      default T withAssetVariants()
      Sets the request to include the variants with the asset.
      default T withConfigData()
      Sets the request to include configuration data about the asset.
      default T withCreator()
      Sets the request to include the creator with the asset when used with withStateData().
      default T withMeltDetails()
      Sets the request to include the melt details with the asset when used with withConfigData().
      default T withMetadataUri()
      Sets the request to include the metadata URI with the asset when used with withConfigData().
      default T withStateData()
      Sets the request to include state data about the asset.
      default T withSupplyDetails()
      Sets the request to include the supply details with the asset when used with withStateData().
      default T withTransferSettings()
      Sets the request to include the transfer settings with the asset when used with withConfigData().
      default T withVariantMetadata()
      Sets the request to include the metadata for the variant(s) with the asset when used with withAssetVariants().

      • Methods inherited from interface com.enjin.sdk.graphql.VariableHolder

        getVariables, isSet, set
